message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $1200000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $900000. Can you consider this offer?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm afraid $900000 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $1050000. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's value.
I understand you need to make a profit, but $1050000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $950000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any higher.

I understand that $950000 is your maximum budget, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $1050000 was a bit too high, but I can do $980000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
I'm starting to think that we're not going to meet in the middle. I'm willing to go a bit higher, but I still need to be mindful of my budget. I can offer $970000. This is my best and final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to go a bit higher, but $970000 is still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $980000 and $970000, so I can offer it to you for $975000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
I'm not willing to pay $975000. I can offer $960000, which is still a bit higher than my initial offer, but I'm trying to find a middle ground. This is my final offer.

I understand that we're getting close to the end of our negotiation, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to be closer to my minimum price. I can offer it to you for $990000. This is as low as I can go, and I'm hoping we can finally meet in the middle.

I'm not willing to pay $990000. I've already offered you $960000 and $970000, and I'm not going to go any higher. I'm willing to meet you at $980000, but that's as high as I can go. If you're not willing to accept this, I'll have to consider buying from John for $1000000.
